scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:svelte && npm run build:react && npm run build:vue && npm run build:cli
scripts.release:core:patch: npm run build:core && npm version patch -w @dxdns/feflow-core --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/core && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version core" && git tag ff-core-v$(node -p "require('./packages/core/package.json').version") && npm run git:push
scripts.release:svelte:patch: npm run build:svelte && npm version patch -w @dxdns/feflow-svelte --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/svelte && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version svelte" && git tag ff-svelte-v$(node -p "require('./packages/svelte/package.json').version") && npm run git:push
